name: worm BOY
description:
One of the best free games in the world, WORM-BOY WILL BE THE TOP NO.10 GAMES APP IN 100 COUNTRIES! Enjoying this game now and see for yourself why the game’s so popular!

Trying ''CHICKEN & WORM'':
• Playing as fast as real time in your Life
• Playing as long time as you can
• Play to get as many points as you can
• Enjoying Game every free time

How to play CHICKEN and WORM ?
• Easy play by Tape on screen
• Up Level by Climb up the rope
• Very easy in slow level (Level 1, 2) and very Hard to Play level from 5 because it's very FAST-RUNNING
• Get score if not to be hit by chickens
• The score increases by increasing level: Level1 - 1 score per chickens hit, Level 2: 2 score per chickens hit, Level 3 - 3 score per chickens hit...

How to INTERACT WITH WORM-BOY:
• Stroke and tickle him, and watch how he responds.

Future:
• LIFELIKE EMOTIONS: Worm-Boy can be happy, hungry , sleepy, bored... The list goes on! His emotions change based on how you play with him.

Other:
• 100% FREE !
• WELCOME to ''WORM-BOY'' free version

Playing now, are you Ready ?
